methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: Initializes the DeFundIt application with the provided beneficiary address.

args.name: addr
args.desc: The Algorand address of the beneficiary.

methods.name: sendFunding
methods.desc: Processes a payment transaction and updates the funds in the DeFundIt application.

args.name: senderTxn
args.desc: The payment transaction to be processed.

methods.name: SendFundToBeneficiary
methods.desc: Transfers the funds to the beneficiary address if the total funds match the funding target.

methods.name: getBeneficiaryAddress
methods.desc: Retrieves the beneficiary address associated with the DeFundIt application.

returns.desc: Address - The Algorand address of the beneficiary.

methods.name: deleteApplication
methods.desc: Deletes the DeFundIt application from the Algorand blockchain.
